snippet.title: Waven | Announcement Trailer | Ankama Games
snippet.description:
Sign up: https://www.waven-game.com/en?utm_source=waven&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=reveal_waven&utm_term=EN&utm_content=

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2343650?utm_source=waven&utm_medium=youtube_description_video&utm_campaign=reveal_waven&utm_term=EN&utm_content=

Forge your own destiny! Choose your character, equip your best spells and sail from island to island in quest of fortune and glory. Level up your hero and your strategy in this free-to-play tactical multiplayer RPG with unique colorful graphics.

WAVEN is a new roleplaying game experience that is accessible, fun and immersive. It combines adventure and turn-based strategy, inspired by the best tactical RPGs, with deckbuilding mechanics and valuable items to collect. It can be played for free online on PC, Mac, smartphone and tablet.
